InputOutputs.Name: EnableKnockOut
InputOutputs.Description: Tells the goal to make the active policing NPC knock out its target

InputOutputs.Name: DisableKnockOut
InputOutputs.Description: Stop the active policing NPC from trying to knock out its target

InputOutputs.Name: OnFirstWarning
InputOutputs.Description: Fires the first time a policing cop warns a target

InputOutputs.Name: OnSecondWarning
InputOutputs.Description: Fires the second time a policing cop warns a target

InputOutputs.Name: OnLastWarning
InputOutputs.Description: Fires when a policing cop warns a target for the last time

InputOutputs.Name: OnSupressingTarget
InputOutputs.Description: Fires when a policing cop starts to suppress (ie. beat) a target

InputOutputs.Name: OnKnockOut
InputOutputs.Description: Fires when a target has been knocked out
